displayName.english: I want to be a Vigilant!

description.english: Welcome to the world of Vigil: The Longest Night!
description.german: Willkommen in der Welt von Vigil: The Longest Night!
description.schinese: 欢迎来到守夜人－长夜的世界！
description.tchinese: 歡迎來到守夜人－長夜的世界！
description.russian: Добро пожаловать в мир игры Vigil: The Longest Night!
description.japanese: 「Vigil-The Longest Night」の世界へようこそ！
description.brazilian: Seja bem-vindo ao mundo de Vigil: The Longest Night!
description.koreana: Vigil-The Longest Night의 세계에 오신 것을 환영합니다!

description.english: Defeat the Craving Terror outside the town
description.tchinese: 擊倒在鎮外徘徊的巨獸

description.schinese: 击倒在镇外徘徊的巨兽

description.japanese: デュランのクエストをクリアする

description.japanese: ひなの母親を倒す

description.tchinese: 協助吉翁士提修完成調查

description.schinese: 协助吉翁士提修完成调查
description.japanese: サーバー・W・スンギの調査を手伝う

displayName.japanese: 夜警の試練をクリアする

description.german: Besiege die Wache alter Zeiten einmal

description.japanese: もう揺らさないで！
description.brazilian: Não balance mais!
